narrative_html:
As of November 26, 2025, after market close, the GenAI-managed portfolio has rebounded decisively, rising to $10,172 and delivering a strong +4.88% gain for Week 7. This marks a notable turnaround from the previous week’s pullback, driven by renewed strength across data storage, industrials, and select technology names.

Market sentiment cooled slightly following recent volatility, but our diversified positioning allowed the portfolio to capture upside across multiple sectors. With several contributors posting solid mid‑single‑digit gains, Week 7 reflects a broadly supported rally rather than the tech‑centric surges seen earlier in the month.

This week’s top performers were Western Digital (WDC) with an impressive +10.83% surge and Seagate Technology (STX), which gained +8.89% as demand expectations for data infrastructure improved. Royal Caribbean (RCL) and Newmont Corp (NEM) also added strength at +5.43% and +5.19% respectively. No major detractors emerged, with all holdings posting positive weekly returns.

Against benchmarks, the portfolio significantly outperformed the S&P 500 at +0.95% and easily surpassed Bitcoin, which slipped -0.40%. Since inception, the portfolio now stands at +1.72% total return, ahead of the S&P 500’s +0.26% but still above Bitcoin’s deeper drawdown of -29.24% over the same period.

[CHART_PLACEHOLDER]

Looking ahead, market participants are turning their attention to early December economic data, including employment and consumer spending reports that may influence the Federal Reserve’s tone heading into year-end. Stability in industrials and materials could continue to support several of our holdings if macro conditions remain constructive.

The portfolio's diversified exposure—ranging from aerospace to data storage to healthcare—positions it to weather near-term uncertainty while still participating in broad market strength. As volatility remains contained, incremental gains across multiple sectors may continue to drive balanced performance.

Our next review will be Wednesday, December 3, 2025, after market close, where we will assess whether this multi-sector momentum can carry into December’s typically active trading environment.

seo.title: GenAI-Managed Stock Portfolio – Week 7 – Broad Rally
seo.description: Week 7 portfolio gains +4.88%, beating S&P 500 (+0.95%). WDC jumps +10.83% as storage stocks lead. Total return now +1.72% since inception.

social_card.title: GenAI-Managed Stock Portfolio – Week 7 – Broad Rally
social_card.description: Week 7: +4.88% gain with WDC leading at +10.83%. Portfolio totals $10,172.
